item.title: redux-persist
item.description: If you need your Redux store to last beyond a page load or refresh, look no further! redux-persist is here to the rescue. item.title: Rule: no-var-requires
item.description: My pre-commit hook complained because the original code had an import that looked like var module = require("module"). The permitted ways to import are: import foo = require('foo') and “ES2015-style imports” which (I think) is defined in this part of the MDN web docs. I wonder when this rule was inserted…
